item.title: tmarkus.eu
item.description: Setup I wanted to set up my webpage for posting articles and thoughts. I was wandering over the vast plains of the internets when I stumbled upon GitHub Pages. Since I have a GitHub account, I thought, why wouldn’t I make myself a webpage. But how? I know some programming â€“ I do some scripting in bash and python, and I know some HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, which should be sufficient for a web page.
